words.def: building that contains a surface for ice skating or roller skating
One of the radiating sticks of a fan.
a liquid used for printing or writing or drawing
a person having kinship with another or others
A cocktail made with a measure of crème de cassis  topped up with white wine.
the writing point of a pen
support resembling the rib of an animal
Ti, a plant native to the Pacific islands and China, Cordyline fruticosa.
a heavy brittle diamagnetic trivalent metallic element (resembles arsenic and antimony chemically)
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
